full_output.summary: I have extensive experience in market research and business development. I completed my undergraduate studies at the University of Lucknow and am now doing an MBA at Galgotias University to further develop my talents. At Mirats Insights, I succeeded as a Project Executive, producing high-quality surveys in the B2B, B2C, and B2H sectors. My position involved careful data analysis and delivering useful insights to clients.

certifications.title: ADVANCED MACRO ECONOMICS & MUTUAL FUND MODULE

experiences.description: Drive business growth and revenue by identifying, prospecting, and acquiring new clients within the staffing and recruitment industry. Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, understanding their hiring needs and providing tailored staffing solutions. Lead negotiations and contract discussions, ensuring favorable terms and conditions while meeting client expectations. Analyze market trends and competitor activities to capitalize on business opportunities and enhance market position. Built strong relationships with clients, leading to increased customer satisfaction and repeat business. Achieve and exceed sales targets consistently through strategic planning, effective networking, and relationship-building efforts.

Provided mentorship, guidance, and training to team members, fostering a collaborative and high-performing work environment conducive to achieving team goals and individual professional growth. Led a team of seven market research analysts and project coordinators a Team Leader at Mirats Insights, overseeing their day-to-day activities and ensuring project objectives were met efficiently. Implemented streamlined processes that improved team efficiency by 20%, resulting more accurate and timely project completions. Monitored team performance and provided constructive feedback to increase productivity and maintain quality standards.

Managed and executed a wide range of market research projects as a Project Executive at Mirats Insights, specializing in delivering high-quality surveys tailored to meet client needs across B2B, B2C, and B2H sectors (Business to Business, Business to Consumer, and Business to Healthcare). Conducted in-depth data analysis and interpreted findings to provide actionable insights to clients, enabling them to make informed business decisions. Maintained strong client relationships through proactive communication, regular project updates, and responsive support to address client inquiries and concerns. Developed and presented detailed reports and presentations summarizing survey findings, market trends, and strategic insights to key stakeholders and decision-makers. Communicated survey results effectively through detailed reports and presentations, facilitating client understanding and strategic planning. Managed project timelines, budgets, and resources efficiently, achieving project goals within specified deadlines and budget constraints.

full_output.name: Ujjwal Jaiswal
